sitename: AAPM-RSS Medical Physics Practice Guideline 9.a. for SRS-SBRT
cleaned_text: | |[ ](https://doi.org/10.1002/acm2.12146) | |[MPPG Report 9.a - 9.a. for SRS-SBRT (2017)](https://doi.org/10.1002/acm2.12146) Category: MPPG Report The purpose of this Medical Physics Practice Guideline (MPPG) is to describe the minimum level of medical physics support deemed prudent for the practice of linear-accelerator, photon-based (linac) body radiation therapy (SBRT) services. As SRS-SBRT services are rapidly adopted into the community practice setting, this Guideline has been developed to provide appropriate minimum standards for such services.
